name: Belatrix Software
tagline: Shaping ideas into great software products
description:
BELATRIX Software is one of Latin America’s foremost agile innovators and application designers. Leveraging the benefits of the Nearshore model, Belatrix helps clients achieve the full impact of their R&D and product development capabilities developing high quality innovative software, QA, testing and mobile solutions.
Applying Agile methodology (Scrum) and Design Thinking approach, the company reduces clients  time to market by offering access to top global talent, applied innovation and industry best practices whilst containing costs. Belatrix’s clients include both established Fortune level and emerging venture backed firms. 
Based in South America, the company has delivery centers in Argentina (Buenos Aires and Mendoza), in Peru (Lima) and in Colombia (Bogota), as well as commercial offices in Silicon Valley, New York, Florida and Europe (Barcelona).
